attributes.action: Alter the way Work Capability Assessments are carried out
attributes.additional_details: The way that ATOS carry out Work Capability Assessments at present is all wrong.  Each individual case should be treated on merit and not on the computer tick box system that is in place at the moment.  After all, every one is different.  Many different people can have the same illness or disability and each person can affected differently.  At present, this is not taken into account.
